name: The Great Waltz
description:
"You are hereby invited to attend The Great Waltz."

Use the mouse to move each foot and the scroll wheel to rotate.

Made in < 72 hours for the Unofficial Playdate Anticipation Jam, using the LÖVE 2D framework.

All design, art, code and music by Christopher Gale.

.exe file for Windows.

.love file for Windows/Mac/Linux
